analysis.description:

BigbomToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#251) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#54)

BigbomTokenExtended.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#532-534) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#54)

BigbomToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#526-529) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#528)

BigbomTokenExtended.airDrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = bigbomToken.balanceOf(recipients[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#565-566)

Reentrancy in BigbomTokenExtended.airDrop (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#561-571):
	External calls:
	- amount = bigbomToken.balanceOf(recipients[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#565-566)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#568-569)
	- frozenAccount (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#568-569)
	- frozenTime (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#568-569)
	- maxAllowedAmount (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#568-569)

BigbomTokenExtended.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#532-534)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x17e65b46ad1ebfb8f9cacde8e274b377831a1253.sol#54)
